short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive alerts when movies on your watchlist become available online to watch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your favorite movies and get notified as soon as they're available for online streaming or downloading from your favorite sources, like torrents.

- Tired of constantly checking the internet to see if that movie you've been wanting to watch is finally available?
This extension taps into trusted sources like OMDb and FileList to notify you the moment your chosen movie becomes available online, whether for streaming or downloading via torrents.
